column4: We got the Linksys WUSB54GC USB thing because ubuntu.com said it worked "out of the box"
but, um.  Their concept of "out of the box" is apparently different from mine.
I went and got a driver rt73 and compiled it, inserted the module, try to bring up the interface, doesn't work.
so at this point, I'm thinking Red Hat might be a better option.
and this join/part/quit stuff is making me insane.  The default IRC client pidgin is apparently not even configurable
check your plugins.  Also, have you read the wireless documentation on the wiki?
can you link me to the docs you are following?
I don't see a link to the wiki there
well you're confusing me now, because we started this conversation with "have you read the docs on the wiki"
I start at the beginning.  At the wiki.  I got linked off to this thread from the wiki
